content: hand motif *¨`* ☠ *¨`* ………… wishing you the skull iest day ever ☠ ✿ *☠`* ¯`v´¯ ☠ ¯`v´¯ *☠`* ✿ ✿ *☠`* ¸ ¯`v´¯ ¸ ´*☠`* ✿ ………… … ¸ ´ … ………… this pattern is © 2025 by ann wanamaker please do not sell copy or publish this pattern for resale stitch guide - sts st- stitches stitch - chain chain stitch - slip st slip_stitch - single_crochet single_crochet - half_double_crochet half_double_crochet - double_crochet --double_crochet any hook any size thread / yarn row 1 ch9 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in each of the next 7 sts ch1 turn 8hdc row 2 2hdc in first st half_double_crochet in each of the next 6 sts 2hdc in next st ch1 turn 10hdc row 3 2hdc in first st half_double_crochet in each of the next 8 sts 2hdc in next st ch1 turn 12hdc row 4 2hdc in first st half_double_crochet in each of the next 11 sts ch1 turn 13hdc row 5 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet in each of the next 12 sts ch6 13hdc 2 row 6 thumb half_double_crochet in second chain from hook half_double_crochet in next individual chain double_crochet in each of the next 2 individual chs 2dc in next individual chain turn piece to continue onto regular row double_crochet in next st this will be the first st of row skip next st slip_stitch ch1 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in each of the next 10 sts ch1 row 7 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet in each of the next 10sts 11hdc row 8 index finger ch9 half_double_crochet in second chain from hook half_double_crochet in next individual chain double_crochet in each of the next 6 individual chs > double_crochet in next st < this will be the first st of row skip next st slip_stitch into each of the next 2sts middle finger ch11 half_double_crochet in second chain from hook half_double_crochet in next individual chain double_crochet in each of the next 8 individual chs > double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch < skip next st slip_stitch into each of the next 2sts ring finger ch9 half_double_crochet in second chain from hook half_double_crochet in next individual chain double_crochet in each of the next 6 individual chs > double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch < skip next st slip_stitch into next st pinky ch6 half_double_crochet in second chain from hook half_double_crochet in next individual chain double_crochet in each of the next 3 individual chs > double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch < skip next st sl st into last st of hand fasten_off leaving a long enough tail to position and sew fingers 3 https //www facebook com/wanamakerart/
